nodes.text: The Ruhx clan, or Ruhx family, was a crime family on Malastare headed by Bog'Ruhx. After Bog'Ruhx "insulted" Bazurkah, leader of the Bazurkah Clan, a rivalry developed between the families and Bog'Ruhx placed a bounty on the entire Bazurkah family. Jango Fett accepted this bounty as well as one from Bazurkah, effectively killing both leaders for the other.
